src:
Hasil Lengkap dan Klasemen Liga Champions Grup A - D
07 Nov 2019, 07:48 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Hasil lengkap matchday ke-4 Liga Champions 2019/2020 yang digelar Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Selain hasil pertandingan, Bolaneters juga bisa menyimak klasemen Grup A hingga D pada artikel ini.
Real Madrid menjadi tim dengan hasil paling gemilang pada matchday ke-4 ini. Los Blancos menang setengah lusin gol saat menjamu Galatasaray. Penyerang muda, Rodrygo tampil bagus dengan mencetak hattrick.
Namun, Real Madrid belum memastikan lolos ke Babak 16 Besar. Dari Grup A, Real Madrid masih berada di bawah PSG. Pada pekan ke-4, PSG menang dengan skor 1-0 atas Club Brugge lewat gol tunggal Mauro Icardi. PSG lolos ke babak 16 Besar.
Kemenangan dramatis diraih Juventus saat berkunjung ke markas Lokomotiv Moskow. Juventus menang lewat gol telat Douglas Costa. Juventus menang dengan skor 1-2 dan mengamankan satu tempat ke babak 16 Besar.

Simak hasil lengkap dan klasemen Liga Champions Grup A sampai D di bawah ini ya Bolaneters.
text:
Complete results and Champions League Group A - D standings
Nov 7, 2019, 07:48 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Complete results of the 4th Matchday 2019/2020 Champions League held on Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs. In addition to the results of the match, Bolaneters can also look at the Group A to D standings in this article.
Real Madrid became the team with the most brilliant results on this 4th matchday. Los Blancos won half a dozen goals at home to Galatasaray. Young striker, Rodrygo performed well by scoring a hat trick.
However, Real Madrid has not confirmed qualifying for the Round of 16. From Group A, Real Madrid is still under PSG. In the 4th week, PSG won with a score of 1-0 over Club Brugge through a single goal by Mauro Icardi. PSG qualify for the Round of 16.
A dramatic victory was won by Juventus during a visit to the Lokomotiv Moscow headquarters. Juventus won by Douglas Costa's late goal. Juventus won 1-2 and secured a place in the last 16.

Check out the full results and standings of the Champions League Groups A through D below, Bolaneters.
